name: Slightly darker volafile.
description:
White username = Not registered user
Blue username = Registered
Light blue username = Donator
Brown-ish username = Moderator/Admin
additional_info:
Is something displayed incorrectly/not styled? Contact me on volafile. I usually hang out on /g/entoomen (http://volafile.io/r/BEEPi).

7th of April 2014:
    Fixed username colors not being styled.

14th of April 2014:
    Lowered the opacity for the black background for the gallery (Image viewer).
    Changed upload button color.

16th of April 2014:
    Changed background color for files (.mp4, .webm, images, .txt   Stuff like that).
    Change text color for .txt files.

17th of April 2014:
    Changed background color for files (.mp4, .webm, images, .txt   Stuff like that). again.
    Fixed a bug where there were two background colors on main page and discover page and top           uploader page.

24th of April 2014:
    Styled dropdown menu next do the Discover button.
    Styled login/register screen.
    Styled filter reminder (XXX Amount of files filtered).
    Styled tooltip thingy (the thing that pops up when you hover over files).

25th of April 2014:
    Fixed color on the "Create a Room" button on the main page. It is now pink again.

26th of April 2014:
    Removed border on the left side of the chat input.
    Edit 1: Fixed usernames not being styled.

30th of April 2014:
    Fixed the buttons/icons (New/Discover) not being the correct color when hovering over them.

6th of May 2014:
    Styled the music player.

27th of May 2014:
    Removed the border on the left of the chat.

??? of May-June 2014:
    Added an option for making your own name red.

4th of June 2014:
    Made some subtle color changes to the toplist.
    Changed color for when you hover over elements in the top bar on the main page.

26th of June 2014:
    Changed the background color for the buttons on the donate page.

31st of July 2014:
    Styled the seekbar for the music player.
    *Updated colors for seekbar for the music player.
    **Removed styling of subdomains of volafile.io.

7th of August 2014:
    Fixed the userstyle so the style applies for https (we secure now).

12th of August 2014:
    The background color should be white for .txt files and other files that open in a window now.
